videoTitle: TOP 3 EU Countries - for Working from Home #shorts
transcription: did you know the Netherlands is the remote working capital of the EU 65 of the Dutch working population worked at least partially remote from January to August last year next are Luxembourg and Sweden at 54 and 52 with an EU average of 13 but the Dutch even enforced remote working flexibility by law one of the first EU countries to do so is working from home the future let us know and subscribe for videos about the EU
